title: Average per game attendance English Premier League 2018/19
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average attendance. In total the number of data points it has is 10.
In general Average attendance has rose over the Year.

Average attendance is slightly increasing from 2009/10 to 2012/13, roughly constant from 2012/13 to 2015/16, slightly increasing from 2015/16 to 2017/18, and lastly roughly constant from 2017/18 to 2018/19.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016/17 and 2017/18.
The highest Average attendance, of value 38495.0 was reached at Year 2017/18
Minimum Average attendance about 34215.0 was reached at Year 2009/10
